statements: SELECT * FROM sound_library
SELECT id, name, category FROM sound_library WHERE category = 'Ambient'
SELECT name, duration FROM sound_library WHERE duration > 3.5
SELECT * FROM sound_library ORDER BY category DESC
SELECT id, name, tags FROM sound_library ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT * FROM sound_library WHERE duration > 10 ORDER BY name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT name, description, category FROM sound_library WHERE category = 'Ambient' ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT id, name, tags FROM sound_library WHERE tags LIKE '%nature%' OR tags LIKE '%water%' AND category = 'Nature'
SELECT * FROM sound_library WHERE category = 'Music' ORDER BY duration ASC LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5
SELECT id, name, file_path FROM sound_library WHERE name LIKE '%rain%' OR name LIKE '%ocean%'
SELECT * FROM sound_effects;
SELECT id, name, category FROM sound_effects WHERE duration < 3.0;
SELECT name, category, duration FROM sound_effects WHERE category = 'Explosion' ORDER BY duration DESC;
SELECT * FROM sound_effects WHERE upload_date >= '2022-01-01' AND upload_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name, category, duration FROM sound_effects WHERE name LIKE '%gun%' AND category IN ('Weapon', 'Gun') ORDER BY duration ASC;
SELECT id, name, category FROM sound_effects WHERE category = 'Ambient';
SELECT name, duration FROM samples WHERE duration > 10.5;
SELECT * FROM sound_effects WHERE upload_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, name, file_path FROM samples ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT id, type, file_path FROM sound_effects WHERE file_path IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM sound_effects;
SELECT name, category FROM sound_effects WHERE duration > '00:00:05';
SELECT id, name, type, duration FROM samples WHERE size > 100;
SELECT name, genre, mood FROM metadata WHERE sound_effect_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM samples ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT name, category FROM sound_effects WHERE duration > '00:30:00';
SELECT * FROM samples WHERE type = 'music' AND size > 100000;
SELECT s.name, m.genre FROM sound_effects s JOIN metadata m ON s.id = m.sound_effect_id WHERE m.genre = 'pop' AND m.mood = 'happy';

SELECT s.name, m.genre, sa.name AS sample_name FROM sound_effects s JOIN metadata m ON s.id = m.sound_effect_id JOIN samples sa ON m.sample_id = sa.id WHERE sa.type = 'sound' AND s.category = 'nature' AND m.genre = 'ambient';
SELECT s.name AS sound_name, COUNT(*) AS sample_count FROM sound_effects s JOIN metadata m ON s.id = m.sound_effect_id GROUP BY s.name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM sound_effects;
SELECT sound_name, category FROM sound_effects WHERE duration > 5;
SELECT sound_name, file_path FROM sound_effects WHERE category = 'nature' ORDER BY sound_name ASC;
SELECT sound_id, sound_name, category FROM sound_effects WHERE sound_name LIKE '%footsteps%' AND category IS NOT NULL;
SELECT library_id, library_name, total_samples FROM sample_libraries WHERE theme = 'horror' ORDER BY total_samples DESC;
SELECT * FROM sound_effects WHERE category = 'Ambient' ORDER BY duration DESC;
SELECT sound_name, category FROM sound_effects WHERE duration > 10 AND category = 'SFX' ORDER BY sound_name ASC;
SELECT s.sound_name, t.tag_name FROM sound_effects s JOIN sound_effect_tags st ON s.sound_id = st.sound_id JOIN tags t ON st.tag_id = t.tag_id WHERE t.tag_name = 'Nature' ORDER BY s.sound_name ASC;
SELECT s.sound_name, l.library_name FROM sound_effects s JOIN sample_libraries l ON s.sound_id = l.library_id WHERE s.duration < 30 ORDER BY s.duration ASC;

SELECT DISTINCT l.library_name, l.theme, COUNT(s.sound_id) AS total_sounds FROM sample_libraries l LEFT JOIN sound_effects s ON l.library_id = s.sound_id GROUP BY l.library_name, l.theme ORDER BY total_sounds DESC;
SELECT * FROM sound_effects WHERE category = 'SFX'
SELECT sound_name, format FROM sound_effects WHERE size > 100
SELECT sound_id, duration FROM sound_effects ORDER BY duration DESC
SELECT sound_name, duration FROM sound_effects ORDER BY sound_name ASC
SELECT library_name, creator, creation_date FROM sample_libraries
SELECT * FROM sound_effects WHERE category='Synth' ORDER BY sound_name ASC;
SELECT sound_name, category, size FROM sound_effects WHERE size > 1000 ORDER BY size DESC;
SELECT library_name, creator, creation_date FROM sample_libraries WHERE creator='John Doe' ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT se.sound_name, t.tag_name FROM sound_effects se JOIN sound_effect_tags set on se.sound_id = set.sound_id JOIN tags t ON set.tag_id = t.tag_id WHERE t.tag_name = 'Sci-Fi';

SELECT sl.library_name, se.sound_name, se.format FROM sample_libraries sl JOIN library_content lc ON sl.library_id = lc.library_id JOIN sound_effects se ON lc.sound_id = se.sound_id WHERE sl.library_name LIKE 'Music%' AND se.format = 'WAV';
